description.p: Evince is a document viewer for multiple document formats: PDF, Postscript, djvu, tiff, dvi, XPS , SyncTex support with gedit and comics books (cbr,cbz,cb7 cbt).
Evince can show your documents in page view, full screen or presentation mode. You can search for keywords in your document or scroll through page thumbnails to navigate documents.
Evince allows you to zoom in or zoom out to see more on your screen. Evince also supports opening password protected PDF files.
